text: Waited so long in front of the pharmacy counter wanting to buy medicine. The whole time I was standing there, there was a staff behind the counter doing her own things until she was done then ask me "oh you waiting for pharmacist is it? Today no pharmacists on duty." Help man... make me wait so long just to tell me that. Facepalm.

Had multiple good experience here because of the pharmacist. Very helpful and empathetic. He proactively approached me when he saw me looking for medicine and recommended me the correct brand and dosage.

The pharmacists here are superb, both are very knowledgeable.. and my experience consulting with Jason always awesome as he is very smart, helpful and resourceful.. the best pharmacist i've known so far. Four thumbs up!
Just void of customers! Empty shop

Black ball black ball, Taiwanese brand
Its Yu Q and other series are delicious
Red bean dense Q-bomb
Worth recommending
